task.label: Robot Initiated
task.value: if @source['Data'] JSON.parse(@source['Data']).has_key? ('Kinetic Robot Execution Record Id') else false end

task.label: Not from Robot
task.value: if !@source['Data'] true elsif !JSON.parse(@source['Data']).has_key? ('Kinetic Robot Execution Record Id') true else false end

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being updated in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Datastore Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being updated.

parameter.label: State
parameter.tooltip: The value used to set the submission state.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: A JSON map of field names to values that should be set.

parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Retrieve By
parameter.tooltip: How to retrieve the submission. Id or Query.

parameter.label: Datastore Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the form to query

parameter.label: Index
parameter.tooltip: The index to use for the search/retrieval

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: A query that will retrieve a single submission

parameter.label: Datastore Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being retrieved.

parameter.label: Data Source:
parameter.tooltip: The source that contains the data to use to create each task in the loop.

parameter.label: Loop Path:
parameter.tooltip: The XPath statement to indicate what data records to process.

parameter.label: Variable Name:
parameter.tooltip: The local variable name used to represent the data used in loop tasks.

parameter.label: Type:
parameter.tooltip: How many loop processes must be completed before continuing?

parameter.label: Number:
parameter.tooltip: If some, how many?

parameters.parameter:
<%= # Normal output if @results.has_key?("Ivanti Search") && @results['Ivanti Search'].has_key?('Handler Error Message') && @results['Ivanti Search']['Handler Error Message'].to_s.empty? outcome = "Successful" output = { "message" => "#{JSON.parse(@results['Ivanti Search']['JSON Results']).length} results returned", "start_query_time" => JSON.parse(@results['Determine Start and End Times']['output'])['query_start_time'], "end_query_time" => JSON.parse(@results['Determine Start and End Times']['output'])['query_end_time'] }.to_json end
# If timeout if !@results.has_key?("Ivanti Search") || !@results['Ivanti Search'].has_key?('Handler Error Message') outcome = "Unsuccessful" output = { "message" => "Timeout during attempted data retrieve" }.to_json end
# Handler errored if @results.has_key?("Ivanti Search") && @results['Ivanti Search'].has_key?('Handler Error Message') && !@results['Ivanti Search']['Handler Error Message'].to_s.empty? outcome = "Unsuccessful" ESCAPE_CHARACTERS = {'&'=>'&', '>'=>'>', '<'=>'<', '"' => '"'} output = { "message" => "Retrieve error: #{@results['Ivanti Search']['Handler Error Message'].to_s.gsub(/[&"><]/) { |special| ESCAPE_CHARACTERS[special] }}" }.to_json end
results = %|<results><result name="outcome">#{outcome}</result><result name="output">#{output}</result></results>| results #raise "#{results}" %>

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Start Context
parameter.tooltip: The lowest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed. Should be one of Submission,Form,Kapp,Space

parameter.label: End Context
parameter.tooltip: The highest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed. Should be one of Space,Kapp,Form,Submission

parameter.label: Property To Find
parameter.tooltip: The Name of the Field/Attribute to search for a match.

parameter.label: Backup Value
parameter.tooltip: If no Field/Attribute value is returned, use this value

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the space to find attribute values in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the kapp to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the form to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to find values in

parameters.parameter:
<%= # Determine start and end time to use in query. Store them as output for use in the Robot output trigger. # Probably using the output from the last execution run, with additional logic to use a the last x minutes if the last execution time is beyond some threshold. # An idea is below:
# Evaluate previous run time. If none, or if > threshold between last run time and now, use current time (meaning the first run will probably find no records). current_time = Time.now previous_run_data = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Kinetic Robot Previous Execution Output'] || {} previous_run_query_end_time = begin Time.parse(previous_run_data['end_query_time'] || current_time.to_s) rescue current_time end
# If (current_time - previous_run_query_end_time) > 1 hour (60 min * 60 sec), use current time. if (current_time - previous_run_query_end_time).to_i > (60*60) previous_run_query_end_time = current_time end
# Set up new query start and end times, ignoring seconds / milliseconds query_start_time = Time.new(previous_run_query_end_time.year, previous_run_query_end_time.month, previous_run_query_end_time.day, previous_run_query_end_time.hour, previous_run_query_end_time.min) query_end_time = Time.new(current_time.year, current_time.month, current_time.day, current_time.hour, current_time.min)
# # Format like this 2017-08-29T22:00:00Z to store last action time....
output = {} output['query_start_time'] = query_start_time.iso8601 output['query_end_time'] = query_end_time.iso8601 output.to_json
%>

parameters.parameter:
<%={
  "Task Run Id" => @run['Id'],
  "Delete After Date Time" => (Time.now + (86400 * (@results['Get Polling Artifact Cleanup Setting']['Value']).to_i)).iso8601
}.to_json%>

parameters.parameter:
<%= # Without replacement: # JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Integration Config']['Values JSON'])['Qualification']
# With replacement: # Parse query variable for {{Start Date}} and {{End Date}} and replace with calculated values.
extracted_times = JSON.parse(@results['Determine Start and End Times']['output']) query_start_time = Time.parse( extracted_times['query_start_time'] ) query_end_time = Time.parse( extracted_times['query_end_time'] ) formatted_start_date = query_start_time.iso8601 formatted_end_date = query_end_time.iso8601
query = JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Integration Config']['Values JSON'])['Qualification']
query.gsub!( "{{Start Date}}", formatted_start_date ) query.gsub!( "{{End Date}}", formatted_end_date )
query
%>

<%= # Without replacement: # JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Integration Config']['Values JSON'])['Qualification']
# With replacement: # Parse query variable for {{Start Date}} and {{End Date}} and replace with calculated values.
extracted_times = JSON.parse(@results['Determine Start and End Times']['output']) query_start_time = Time.parse( extracted_times['query_start_time'] ) query_end_time = Time.parse( extracted_times['query_end_time'] ) formatted_start_date = query_start_time.iso8601 formatted_end_date = query_end_time.iso8601
query = JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Integration Config']['Values JSON'])['Qualification']
query.gsub!( "{{Start Date}}", formatted_start_date ) query.gsub!( "{{End Date}}", formatted_end_date )
query
%>

task.label: Has Error
task.value: !@results['Ivanti Search']['Handler Error Message'].to_s.empty? && !@results.has_key?('Error Notification: Cherwell Timeout')
